Class MainViewController

  • java.lang.Object
    • viewcontroller.MainViewController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.lynden.gmapsfx.MapComponentInitializedListener, javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class MainViewController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable, com.lynden.gmapsfx.MapComponentInitializedListener
    MainViewController Class controls the listView of restaurants and embedded google maps view.

        public void initialize(java.net.URL location,
                       java.util.ResourceBundle resources)

        Specified by:

      • mapInitialized

        public void mapInitialized()
        mapInitializer for GmapsFX library Sets desired map options and creates GoogleMap object Focuses map on a predestined location (Helsinki) Calls @see #updateMainView(List restaurants) at end
